name: Kill Cufon
description: Hides the appearance of cufon text and shows plain text instead. Cufon / Cufón Note: This only handles cufon using the canvas element. I don't know if there are other versions.
additional_info: Cufon Cufón disable counter counteract reverse revert convert canvas html5 undo Cufon text can be disabled by disabling Javascript entirely or by blocking the specific JS file handling the text conversion into cufon. An example of a website using cufon for headings.
